title: Ball
desc:
Post 56
- Instead of going in the play pile, you may toss this to another player, giving them this card, you cannot toss it to whoever targeted you last.
- A <:red:1106234051129507932> ball is burning, it will have a secret amount of remaning passes [4-7] until it explodes on the last target's face, making them skip their next turn and draw a random <:red:1106234051129507932> number card.
